title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste dosto! Aaj main aap sabse apni kala yatra ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.

Anushka: Bachpan mein, rang aur kagaz hi mere sabse achhe dost the. Diwaaron par bhi painting karti thi, maa se daant bhi padti thi!

Anushka: Fir bade hote hote, socha, "kya main ise apna profession bana sakti hoon?" Darr toh laga, par dil ne kaha, "try toh kar!"

Anushka: Maine art school join kiya. Wahaan, mujhe pata chala ki kala sirf rang bharna nahi hai, yeh toh ek bhasha hai.

Anushka: Kai baar nakamyabi mili, paintings bikti nahi thi, logon ko samajh nahi aata tha. Par main haar nahi maani.

Anushka: Fir ek din, ek chhoti si gallery mein meri paintings lagi aur... logon ne pasand kiya!

Anushka: Aaj main jo bhi hoon, apni kala ki vajah se hoon. Ye sirf ek career nahi, meri zindagi hai.

Anushka: Toh, agar aapka bhi koi passion hai, toh use kabhi mat chhodiye. Kya pata, wohi aapki manzil ban jaaye. Dhanyavaad!
